data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cheng, Xin-Yue, Thompson, Christian (2008): A generic conspectus of the Microdontinae (Diptera: Syrphidae) with the description of two new genera from Africa and China. Zootaxa 1879: 21-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184168
